name: Redwing
description:
Description and lore

Redwing is a 2D survival fast paced shooter in space, the goal is to eliminate all enemy threats making use of your diverse tool kit.

You are the only compatible soul with the mech called Redwing, the only mech in the entire universe capable of stopping the alien invasion. In the last effort for humanity survival, you are forced to defend earth by piloting Redwing for the first time under the supervision and instructions of the veteran captain Yellowstar.

Credits Programming
  • Adrià Mir Feliu (https://mcreeper00.itch.io/)
  • Oriol Ferrer
  • Toni Galmes
